---
title: "Tracks of Light"
page-layout: full
description: "A personal photo album showcasing moments captured around the world."
---

<style>
  :root {
    --album-bg: linear-gradient(140deg, #f6f8ff 0%, #eef3ff 45%, #ffffff 100%);
    --album-primary: #2f5cf5;
    --album-ink: #253045;
    --album-muted: #6a7486;
  }

  .album-hero {
    background: var(--album-bg);
    border: 1px solid rgba(47, 92, 245, 0.12);
    border-radius: 18px;
    padding: 1.35rem 1.6rem;
    margin-bottom: 1.8rem;
    box-shadow: 0 18px 52px rgba(18, 38, 63, 0.10);
  }

  .album-grid {
    column-count: 4;
    column-gap: 1rem;
  }

  @media (max-width: 1200px) { .album-grid { column-count: 3; } }
  @media (max-width: 900px) { .album-grid { column-count: 2; } }
  @media (max-width: 600px) { .album-grid { column-count: 1; } }

  .album-card {
    break-inside: avoid;
    margin: 0 0 1rem;
    background: #fff;
    border-radius: 16px;
    padding: 0.75rem;
    border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);
    box-shadow: 0 14px 38px rgba(18, 38, 63, 0.10);
    transform: translateY(6px);
    opacity: 0;
    transition: transform 220ms ease, box-shadow 220ms ease, border-color 220ms ease, opacity 320ms ease;
  }

  .album-card.visible {
    transform: translateY(0);
    opacity: 1;
  }

  .album-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-6px);
    box-shadow: 0 20px 42px rgba(18, 38, 63, 0.16);
    border-color: rgba(47, 92, 245, 0.22);
  }

  .album-card img {
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    max-height: 220px;
    object-fit: cover;
    border-radius: 12px;
    display: block;
    margin-bottom: 0.65rem;
    filter: saturate(1.08);
    transition: transform 180ms ease;
  }

  .album-card:hover img {
    transform: scale(1.02);
  }

  .album-caption {
    display: grid;
    gap: 0.2rem;
    color: var(--album-ink);
  }

  .album-caption strong {
    font-size: 1rem;
    letter-spacing: 0.1px;
  }

  .album-meta {
    display: inline-flex;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    align-items: center;
    font-size: 0.82rem;
    color: var(--album-muted);
  }

  .album-chip {
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.35rem;
    padding: 0.25rem 0.55rem;
    border-radius: 999px;
    background: rgba(47, 92, 245, 0.08);
    color: #20438a;
    font-size: 0.82rem;
  }

  .album-chip i {
    font-style: normal;
  }

  .album-title {
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    color: #1f4cb5;
  }

  /* Lightbox */
  .album-lightbox {
    position: fixed;
    inset: 0;
    background: rgba(12, 18, 28, 0.88);
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    z-index: 9999;
    opacity: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
    transition: opacity 180ms ease;
  }

  .album-lightbox.visible {
    opacity: 1;
    pointer-events: auto;
  }

  .album-lightbox img {
    max-width: min(88vw, 1100px);
    max-height: 82vh;
    border-radius: 14px;
    box-shadow: 0 24px 60px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.35);
  }

  .album-lightbox .album-close {
    position: absolute;
    top: 18px;
    right: 24px;
    font-size: 1.1rem;
    color: #f8f9fb;
    cursor: pointer;
    padding: 0.35rem 0.6rem;
    border-radius: 999px;
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12);
    border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.18);
  }
</style>

<div id="album-grid" class="album-grid" aria-live="polite"></div>

<script>
  (async () => {
    const grid = document.getElementById("album-grid");
    if (!grid) return;

    const status = document.createElement("div");
    status.style.margin = "0.5rem 0 1rem";
    status.style.color = "#5d6a7b";
    status.textContent = "Loading photos‚Ä¶";
    grid.parentNode.insertBefore(status, grid);

    // Try common publish layouts: root (/files/...) and Netlify sites that publish /docs.
    const candidateUrls = [
      new URL("files/photos/photos.json", window.location.origin + "/").toString(),
      new URL("docs/files/photos/photos.json", window.location.origin + "/").toString()
    ];

    const fetchPhotos = async () => {
      let lastErr;
      for (const url of candidateUrls) {
        try {
          const res = await fetch(url, { cache: "no-cache" });
          if (!res.ok) throw new Error(`Fetch failed: ${res.status}`);
          return await res.json();
        } catch (err) {
          lastErr = err;
        }
      }
      throw lastErr || new Error("Unable to load photos.json");
    };

    const formatTitle = (p) => {
      const bits = [];
      if (p.year) bits.push(p.year);
      if (p.place) bits.push(p.place);
      if (p.title) bits.push(p.title);
      return bits.join(" ‚Ä¢ ");
    };

    let photos = [];
    try {
      photos = (await fetchPhotos()).sort((a, b) => {
        // Sort by year desc (string ok with YYYY), then place asc, then filename.
        if (a.year !== b.year) return b.year.localeCompare(a.year);
        if (a.place !== b.place) return a.place.localeCompare(b.place);
        return a.file.localeCompare(b.file);
      });
    } catch (err) {
      console.error("Photo load error:", err);
      status.textContent = "Êó†Ê≥ïÂä†ËΩΩÁÖßÁâáÊ∏ÖÂçïÔºàphotos.jsonÔºâ„ÄÇ";
      return;
    }

    if (!photos.length) {
      status.textContent = "ÊöÇÊó†ÁÖßÁâáÔºåÁ®çÂêéÂÜçËØï„ÄÇ";
      return;
    }

    // Add cards to the grid
    photos.forEach((p, idx) => {
      const card = document.createElement("article");
      card.className = "album-card";
      card.style.transitionDelay = `${Math.min(idx * 15, 180)}ms`;

      const img = document.createElement("img");
      img.loading = "lazy";
      img.alt = formatTitle(p) || "Photo";
      img.src = `files/photos/${encodeURIComponent(p.file)}`;

      const caption = document.createElement("div");
      caption.className = "album-caption";
      caption.innerHTML = `
        <strong>${p.place || "Somewhere"}</strong>
        <div class="album-meta">
          <span class="album-chip"><i>üìç</i>${p.place || "Unknown"}</span>
          <span class="album-chip"><i>üìÖ</i>${p.year || "----"}</span>
        </div>
        <span class="album-title">${p.title || ""}</span>
      `;

      card.append(img, caption);
      grid.appendChild(card);
    });

    // Reveal on scroll
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver(
      (entries) => {
        entries.forEach((entry) => {
          if (entry.isIntersecting) {
            entry.target.classList.add("visible");
            observer.unobserve(entry.target);
          }
        });
      },
      { threshold: 0.15 }
    );
    document.querySelectorAll(".album-card").forEach((c) => observer.observe(c));

    // Simple lightbox
    const lightbox = document.createElement("div");
    lightbox.className = "album-lightbox";
    lightbox.innerHTML = `<button class="album-close" aria-label="Close">Close ‚úï</button><img alt="">`;
    document.body.appendChild(lightbox);

    const lbImg = lightbox.querySelector("img");
    const closeLb = () => lightbox.classList.remove("visible");

    lightbox.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
      if (e.target === lightbox || e.target.classList.contains("album-close")) closeLb();
    });
    document.addEventListener("keydown", (e) => { if (e.key === "Escape") closeLb(); });

    document.querySelectorAll(".album-card img").forEach((img) => {
      img.addEventListener("click", () => {
        lbImg.src = img.src;
        lbImg.alt = img.alt;
        lightbox.classList.add("visible");
      });
    });
  })();
</script>
